channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: arXiv No Longer Accepts Computer Science Position or Review Papers Due to LLMs
item.description:
This change is being implemented due to the unmanageable influx of review articles and position papers to arXiv CS. How do I submit my review article or position paper to arXiv. Review articles or position papers must be accepted to a journal or conference before being submitted to arXiv and you must have documentation of complete and successful peer review.

Read more
